articles.title: Elon Musk helped Trump win and is now looking at Europe. Many politicians there are alarmed - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Fresh from pouring his money and energies into helping Donald Trump win re-election, Elon Musk has trained his sights on Europe.
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Fresh from pouring his money and energies into helping Donald Trump win re-election, Elon Musk has trained his sights on Europe, setting off alarm bells among politicians across the conti… [+6329 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Nimmo, Lucy White
articles.title: Elon Musk Steps Up Starmer Row Just as UK Tops Tesla Sales in Europe - Bloomberg
articles.description: Elon Musk is ramping up his attacks on British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and his new Labour government at the same time as the UK emerges as the largest market in Europe for Tesla Inc. vehicles.
articles.content:
